conversations.description: User uploads a SaaS Master Services Agreement and asks the system to rank the overall contract risk.
User extracts the "Indemnification" clause from a recently uploaded hardware purchase contract.
User requests litigation precedents for a broad limitation‑of‑liability clause in a California‑based contract.
System calculates a risk score of 78 for a non‑compete clause and explains the contributing factors.
User asks for mitigation language to narrow the scope of the indemnity clause identified as high‑risk.
User requests a full PDF report that includes raw case summaries for all high‑risk clauses.
User uploads a merger agreement and wants the platform to flag any termination‑for‑convenience language.
User extracts the "Data Privacy" clause and compares it against GDPR‑related litigation outcomes.
System retrieves three UK case outcomes where insufficient data‑security provisions led to damages.
User asks the platform to suggest a revised data‑breach notification timeline to lower exposure.
User uploads a construction contract and requests a risk score specifically for the "Force Majeure" clause.
System returns a risk score of 42 and cites recent natural‑disaster litigation in Florida.
User asks for an alternative clause that balances force‑majeure protection with contractor obligations.
User extracts the "Audit Rights" clause from a vendor agreement and wants comparable case law.
System pulls two US cases where overly broad audit rights resulted in costly disputes.
User asks the LLM to rewrite the audit clause to limit scope while preserving compliance needs.
User uploads a employment contract and queries the risk associated with the "At‑Will" termination language.
System calculates a moderate risk score and references a recent California wrongful‑termination lawsuit.
User requests a mitigation suggestion to add severance provisions to the at‑will clause.
User uploads a licensing agreement and wants the platform to assess the royalty‑payment clause risk.
System retrieves four cases where ambiguous royalty calculations led to litigation in New York.
User asks for a clear, formula‑based amendment to the royalty clause to reduce ambiguity.
User extracts the "Confidentiality" clause from a non‑disclosure agreement for risk analysis.
System returns a low‑risk score but highlights a missing carve‑out for legally required disclosures.
User asks for wording to add a specific carve‑out for regulatory reporting requirements.
User uploads a franchise agreement and requests a risk assessment of the "Territory Exclusivity" clause.
System finds high risk due to precedent cases where vague exclusivity led to franchisee disputes.
User asks for language that precisely defines geographic boundaries to mitigate the identified risk.
User extracts the "Warranty" clause from a product supply contract and wants similar litigation cases.
System returns three cases where unlimited warranties resulted in multi‑million‑dollar judgments.
User requests a revised warranty clause limiting liability to the contract price and a 30‑day cure period.
User uploads a joint venture agreement and asks the LLM to evaluate the "Profit‑Sharing" clause risk.
System calculates a moderate risk score and cites a Texas joint‑venture dispute over profit allocations.
User asks for a more balanced profit‑sharing formula that reduces the chance of future litigation.
User extracts the "Change Order" clause from a construction contract and wants related case outcomes.
System retrieves two California cases where overly permissive change orders caused cost overruns.
User requests language that requires written approval and cost caps for any change orders.
User uploads a service level agreement (SLA) and asks for a risk score on the "Downtime Penalty" clause.
System reports high risk because similar penalties have been deemed unenforceable in EU courts.
User asks for a revised penalty clause that complies with EU consumer protection standards.
User extracts the "Assignment" clause from a technology licensing deal for risk evaluation.
System finds low risk but notes missing consent language for third‑party assignments.
User requests addition of a consent‑required provision for any future assignment of rights.
User uploads a loan agreement and wants to assess the risk of the "Default Interest" clause.
System cites a New York case where excessive default interest was struck down as usurious.
User asks for a revised default‑interest rate that aligns with state usury laws.
User extracts the "Governing Law" clause from an international supply contract and asks for jurisdiction‑specific risks.
System highlights potential enforcement issues in the chosen jurisdiction based on recent arbitration rulings.
User requests a dual‑jurisdiction clause that offers fallback to a more enforceable venue.
User uploads a marketing services contract and asks for a risk assessment of the "Intellectual Property Ownership" clause.
System returns a high risk score, referencing cases where vague IP ownership led to infringement claims.
User asks for clear language specifying that all created content is owned by the client.
User extracts the "Termination for Cause" clause from a distribution agreement and seeks relevant case law.
System provides two cases where ambiguous cause definitions resulted in protracted litigation.
User requests a refined definition of "Cause" that includes material breach and insolvency triggers.
